column2: After the fall and reannexation of Baltica, the Svedlanders and Suomi people came to join our empire. Now they desire a bit more freedom.
Form the Dominion of Cote d'Azur
Our French people yearn for control of their own destiny. We can allow them a certain degree of independence.
Our Southeast African colonials yearn for control of their own destiny. We can allow them a certain degree of independence.
While the outer areas of Southland are independent, we've directly controlled the interior. We should reconsider this arrangement.
Sale of Land to the USF
We have some wastelands between Pacifica and the USF - we could make some money by getting rid of it.
We could get some extra money by selling Vancouver Island to Cascadia.
We could get some extra money by selling this empty land to Mexico.
